scripts.build:dragon: cd flying-dragon && cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/flying-dragon.wasm --out-dir ../src/lib/wasm/dragon --no-typescript
scripts.build:rubik: cd rubik && cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/rubik.wasm --out-dir ../src/lib/wasm/rubik --no-typescript
